executable.title: Curve Extraction
executable.description: Automatic Sulcal/Gyral Curve Extraction. Please refer to the following paper for details: Lyu et al., TRACE: A Topological Graph Representation for Automatic Sulcal Curve Extraction, IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging.

string.name: inputPoint
string.description: Input sulcal/gyral points prior to the curve delineation (no extension required): *.spoint | *.gpoint

string.name: output
string.description: A prefix of output curves (no extension required): *.scurve | *.gcurve | *.scurve.vtk | *.gcurve.vtk

boolean.name: interm
boolean.description: Output sulcal/gyral points prior to the curve delineation, which follow the output name: *.spoint | *.gpoint

float.name: gseed
float.description: Initial seed threshold for gyral point detection

float.name: sseed
float.description: Initial seed threshold for sulcal point detection

float.name: eprad
float.description: A radius for end point detection

float.name: nhdist
float.description: A geodesic distance of neighborhoods for curve delineation

integer.name: iterTensor
integer.description: NN tensor matrix smoothing: # of iterations

boolean.name: simp
boolean.description: Curve simplification to reduce the number of sulcal points of the delineated curves

boolean.name: junc
boolean.description: Exclusion of junction points in the output file (scurve or gcurve)
